title: leaver busters
body: I was just playing a game against a q of four who just sat in my lane for a good 5 minutes, so i left the game because i didn't want to deal with that. So I got leaver busters(which i guess i deserved) but i got ino a game finally after a 30 minute q. then i locked in and pulled up steam to play another game while i waited. someone dodged however the client didn't alert me, i am now sitting here in another 20 minute q still having not played a game. if there is any way i can get one leaver removed(since i have already waited out the twenty minutes) ide apreciate it if that could happen

replies.body: Whelp, that really does suck that you ended up with an LPQ for missing that queue. It's best to watch those queue's since they could pop at any minute.
